reviews.review_msg: Hilarious cause she's actually a joke of a professor. Always makes excuses for not answering our emails and not posting assignments on time. If you're too busy then don't teach at the university level. We pay thousands of dollars for people like her to ruin our semesters. I learned more from her TA's and the textbook in one day than her in the sem

I am an arts student taking this course ofor my Q and Sci credit. She is the most unorganized prof on this planet! Can't get anything together. Materiel isn't very hard but she doesn't teach it which makes this simple chemistry very hard! The TA does not speak english and doesnt know anything. I would avoid this class!!!

She's passionate about chemistry.She does talk about her family sometimes,but that's because it's chemistry related.First MT was easy, just study the textbook.But really, if you haven't taken ANY CHEM,or is bad at it, the calculations in the final were PRETTY tricky,nothing she taught before.TA was HORRIBLE& slow, she marks so hard for no reason.

I loved this course for the most part. Goyan was great. The material was interesting and applicable. I worked hard and found the midterm very easy. Yes, she likes to talk about her life but does it to relate chemistry to everyday life. I see nothing wrong with that! That said, I didn't think the # of assignments were fair, and our TA was HORRIBLE!

Agree with the other posters, she doesn't lecture about the class at all yet the exams are extremely hard. She told us her life's story every class. She said she got knocked up and her new boyfriend is better than the father of her child?! TMI. She brought her dogs and they're cut but they ran around and freaked people out.
SHE SUCKS AND HER TA， they are unbelievably irresponsible.TOOOOO MUCH PAPER AND Turnitin drive me crazy！！！！！！！！！！！！！！
WORST PORF EVER!!!!!!i should've read the rating before i take the course! WAY TOO MANY PAPERS TAT HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH THE COURSE!
Absolutely irresponsible. Impossible to contact her after the final exam. You will NOT be able to locate her either through email OR her office.

Hated chem more than ever after taking this. first year course: 6 papers,1 MT,1 final, iclicker....ridiculous, more writing than english + communication courses. By end of semester, we learn more of her laywer brother, pharmacist father, and boyfriend than the course material. i am disappointed in SFU chemisty.

THANK YOU Prof. Goyan for creating this wonderful course call Chemistry 192. Not only is this a great Q course for us Arts people, but I had never feel so alive and relax in a science course before. The best part is that I got myself an A, the highest grade I EVER got in university. We need MORE courses like Chemistry 192!

She could be a bit clearer about what readings we need to do or when assignments are due, but her demos are usually fantastic to watch and this class is a great choice for the Arts student who needs a science credit.

Easiest class ever. Lectures have no correlation to the 3 projects required for this class. She is very lenient and I believe she will give everyone a fairly good grade. The textbook was obsolete. Never had to use it. Internet research was all that was required of this course. She is a nice person, though.
